topic.title: Announcements
topic.shortdesc: Allows you to quickly add annnouncements to your webpages.

body.p: The Announcements module can be used to highlight special events or information. The most valuable feature this module offers is its ability to automatically expire. No more sorting through text, deleting old information! You control how long an announcement is displayed by setting the module's Expiration Date.
You can add multiple articles, whose HTML description are displayed fully in the module. You also have an option for a Read More link, for more information.
